segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of the message and to transmit function, type and number of the message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time of the preparation of the message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify the document or message to which the current message relates, and related date and time.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to identify a reference which applies to the entire message, e.g. reference to previous message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time relating to the reference.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to identify a party and related contacts.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the liner service operating or responsible for a particular vessel/voyage.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to identify a contact and its communications related to the party.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department within the party.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments identifying the means of transport and related details.

segment.name: Details of transport
segment.documentation: TDT, A segment to identify a means of transport and discharge voyage number.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to identify the locations to which the following information applies.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time of events in local time, else the time zone specifier is to be used.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to identify the loading voyage number.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to transmit general information about vessel/voyage.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments containing information about the total numbers of equipment and/or goods by location.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to identify locations (ports) relevant to the equipment or goods carried.

segment.name: Goods item details
segment.documentation: GID, A segment to identify the number of packages of the goods.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments containing information about the type of equipment and the number of units.

segment.name: Equipment details
segment.documentation: EQD, A segment to identify the type of equipment to which the following totals apply. Only transport equipment size/type coded or plain language is used here further to identify the type of equipment.

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference number to equipment.
